transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is daniel john
lee with tour restoration ministries it
is thursday morning got here a little
early to campus because these are my
last two days to be at psu forever i
preached here on and off for 13 years
and most recently since the survival
began i've preached here now 21 days
counting today since november first and
starting january first 2014 i will no
longer be allowed to come here because
of my ex-wife enrolling as a student
here so i'm trying to make this day
count so i got here a little early it's
only ten-thirty in the morning a little
past 1030 anyway it is the ninth day the
ninth month and it is the fifth day of
the week thursday december the 12th 2013
here again to film more podcasts in the
hopes that it'll draw attention of
students and I'll have some more one on
one with the seeing opportunities I had
quite a bit of interaction yesterday if
you saw I've made 11 videos so now we're
on tour rule number 33 tour rule number
33 and tour rule number 33 is sort of
related to the mikvah by fire now when I
say mikvah that's just what the
Christians called baptism okay and there
are a lot of different mikvahs in the
Torah there's the mikvah of cleanliness
so like when you have a nocturnal
emission like if you have a wet dream
then you need to have a mikveh a shower
or running water you know so you can be
clean by the next evening this is an
important cleanliness thing so there's
cleanliness mcfuzz there's the mikvah of
repentance which John preached where you
make a public display in front of your
brothers and sisters in Christ you're
going to live toward yon and not sin any
more and then there's the mikvah by fire
and that's that's the most important
that's the mikvah of the ruach ha kodesh
and i wanted to talk about this one for
tour rule number 33 big book by fire
when you get baptized with the ruach ha
kodesh the holy spirit which is what the
apostles experienced when shavuot
Pentecost was fulfilled two thousand
years ago and what we should all
experience as a living reality in our
lives because the Torah says all of the
tort says you got to keep the payments
and listen to his voice you can only
listen to his voice if you have that
mikvah by fire that baptism of the holy
spirit but apostle shall you'll talks
about the gifts of the Holy Spirit the
operations and gets the Holy Spirit when
he writes his epistle to the Corinthians
and these gifts there's nine of them you
know you can read about them there's the
gift of healing to get the discerning of
spirits to give them knowledge the gift
of tongues the gift of interpretation of
tongues the gift you know there's a lot
of different gifts and there's nine of
them now not all of us have online of
them some of us have online of them some
of us have two or three of them some of
us have only one but all of us if we
love Yahshua if we profess his name if
we keep his Commandments we should at
least have one of these so you should at
least have you know one of the gifts
interpretation of tongues or speaking in
tongues or healing or discerning of
spirits or gift of knowledge or word of
knowledge of that you know things like
that gift of healing and again you can
read about these nine gifts in the
Epistle to the Corinthians but at least
one of these gifts needs to be active in
your lives if if if you do not have any
one of the nine gifts of the ruach ha
kodesh then you don't know Yahshua okay
you've got to have one of those gifts at
least because it's for convicting
centers bring them to repentance it's
also to build up the body of Messiah to
edify others and encourage them so these
are tools that you need we're all part
of the same body we all have different
functions and purposes and we all have
to use our gifts that you guys given to
us by the same spirit to build each
other up and bring us closer to Yahshua
so if you don't have one of these nine
gates you need to repent you need to ask
for the mikvah by fire and you pray for
at least one of them I desire all of
them but the only ones i have are i have
the gift of tongues the gift of
interpretation of tongues the gift of
prophecy the gift of discerning of
spirits the gift or the word of
knowledge and those are the only ones i
have but i'm hoping to get more so pray
for these pray for them earnestly this
is what possible shout will pass and
this is what yah has always wanted to
give his people this is why Moses his
face shine so brightly had to put a veil
over his face because his rights
couldn't stand look at them because
Moses had that baptism of the Holy
Spirit that's what we need this is a
tour rule number 33 you absolutely need
this to survive the Great Tribulation
you must do this or you will go to the
lake of fire so please keep this rule to
our rule number 33 this is daniel john
lee with tour restoration ministries
websites ww spirit and tour com filming
here at psu second to the last day that
